system.description:
“Heaven crumbles and the seas boil! With nothing but my name writ across the stars... Siga!” A popular mudra amongst Makinaadmanon that truly encapsulates their position as magickal artillery. This spell was perfected by Makinaadmanon warriors that needed to sneak through ancient temples guarded by Akai invaders.

Spend 1 Beat to perform Siga: make a Ranged Fire Faith Attack vs 1 fighter in range 5, then inflict Fray 1.

Spend 2 Beats to perform Kusiga: Change the attack to Area Fire Faith Attack vs range 4 burst 1.

Spend 3 Beats to perform Devasiga. As with Kusiga but with the following effect: all squares in the burst become Fire Terrain.
